description: The Utsu Semi Japanese Maple (Acer palmatum 'Utsu Semi') is an amazing addition to any garden. This attractive, hardy specimen boasts attractive foliage in a variety of colors all year round. In spring and summer, the leaves are a vibrant green, while in autumn and winter they turn a brilliant yellow, pink and orange. This tree also has an interesting, weeping form that adds interest and texture. Plus, it can tolerate temperatures as low as -20Â°F and grows well in full sun or partial shade. With proper care and maintenance, this gorgeous tree will last for many years and will become an eye-catching focal point for any outdoor space.
